errors.formattedMessage: If Yul optimizer is disabled, only an empty optimizerSteps sequence is accepted. Note that if an empty or blank string is supplied, the default cleanup sequence is used. The empty sequence is properly denoted by ":".
errors.message: If Yul optimizer is disabled, only an empty optimizerSteps sequence is accepted. Note that if an empty or blank string is supplied, the default cleanup sequence is used. The empty sequence is properly denoted by ":".
